summary: Follows the plight of real-life dancers as they struggle through auditions for the Broadway revival of "A Chorus Line". Also investigates the history of the show and the creative minds behind the original and current incarnations.

director: Directors: Adam Del Deo, James D. Stern
title: Every Little Step
